input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path of the text file to append to

input.name: Text
input.narrative: The text to append to the file

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: This process starts processing of invoice numbers sequentially.

stage.name: Load Config
stage.narrative: This process finds the country and loads the predifined variance amount.

stage.name: Note4
stage.narrative:
This process launches the JDE and Navigates to Manual invoice entry processing screen.
Dependencies: 1. Path of the JDE emulator to be provided in Application modeller of object jde-mainframe

stage.name: Initialise BOT
stage.narrative: This Process loads global variable and folder paths

stage.name: Capture Screenshot
stage.narrative: Capture Screenshot

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
This will initialise the BOT and sets up folder paths, required configuration and credentials.
Dependencies: 1. Set the root folder path in "Folder Path" in environment variables. 3. Bot reads email properties from environment variables 4. Bot reads the OCR file from "OCR File Path" set in environment variables.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: This process loads the extracted OCR data from remittance advice.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
This process gets the variance allowed for a country.
Dependencies: 1. Variance.xlsx file should be present in Config Files folder with the required details.

stage.name: ocrFilePath
stage.narrative: This folder path contains the OCR extracted file recieved from KTA

stage.name: folderPath
stage.narrative: Reads the root folder path defined in environment variables

stage.name: dataDirectory
stage.narrative: Created Data directory inside the root folder

stage.name: inBoundDir
stage.narrative: This variable holds the path for Inbound directory created under Data folder

stage.name: processedDirectory
stage.narrative: This variable holds the path for processed directory created under Data folder

stage.name: inProcessDirectory
stage.narrative: This variable holds the path for InProcess directory created under Data folder

stage.name: errorDirectory
stage.narrative: This variable holds the path for Error directory created under Data folder

stage.name: logsDirectory
stage.narrative: This variable holds the path Log directory created under Root folder

stage.name: configFolderPath
stage.narrative: This variable holds the path Config File directory which is picked up from environment variables

stage.name: logDateDirectory
stage.narrative: This variable holds the path Log directory created for each run under Log folder

stage.name: logFilePath
stage.narrative: This variable holds the log file path created under Logs folder

stage.name: screenshotDirectory
stage.narrative: This variable holds the screenshot directory path created under Logs folder

stage.name: varianceFilepath
stage.narrative: This is path of variance file placed under Config Files folder

stage.name: email username
stage.narrative: Reads the email user name defined in environment variables

stage.name: email password
stage.narrative: Reads the email password defined in environment variables

stage.name: POP3 Port
stage.narrative: Reads the email POP3 port defined in environment variables

stage.name: POP3 Server
stage.narrative: Reads the email POP3 server name defined in environment variables

stage.name: SMTP Port
stage.narrative: Reads the email SMTP port defined in environment variables

stage.name: SMTP Server
stage.narrative: Reads the email SMTP server name defined in environment variables

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
This page contains the global variables which will be consumed by other processes/objects.
Dependencies: None

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
This is the main page for RA processing.
Dependencies: None

input.name: Directory Name
input.narrative: The directory to check exists

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path of the text file to append to

input.name: Text
input.narrative: The text to append to the file
input.expr: Now() & " Error:" & " " & " Configuration file folder does not exists at " &[configFolderPath]

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file to check

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file to check

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path of the text file to append to

input.name: Text
input.narrative: The text to append to the file
input.expr: Now() & " Error:" & " " & " Configuration file does not exists at " &[configFolderPath]

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path of the text file to append to

input.name: Text
input.narrative: The text to append to the file
input.expr: Now() & " Error:" & " " & " Variance file does not exists at " &[varianceFilepath]

exception.detail: "Configuration folder or Config files are not exists"

stage.name: ocrFileName
stage.narrative: This collections store the filepaths

input.name: Folder
input.narrative: The folder in which to look for files

input.name: Patterns CSV
input.narrative: The comma seperated list of wildcard patterns

input.name: Row Index
input.narrative: The row index within the collection to read from. The index is from 0 to N-1 (where N is the total number of rows in the collection).

input.name: Collection
input.narrative: The collection to read.

input.name: Field Name
input.narrative: The field within the collection to read.

output.name: Value Read
output.narrative: The value of the requested field as text.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.name: Enable Events
input.narrative: Flag to indicate that events should be enabled / disabled on the attached instance - defaulted to True

output.name: handle
output.narrative: An integer which can be used to identify the created instance in subsequent actions

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The integer handle identifying the instance on which the required workbook should be opened. The default of zero indicates the currently active instance.

input.name: File name
input.narrative: The path and name of the file which should be opened.

output.name: Workbook Name
output.narrative: The name used by Excel to identify the workbook - usually this is the file name (without the path).

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The integer handle identifying the instance on which the specified collection should be written. The default of zero indicates the currently active instance.

input.name: Collection
input.narrative: The collection containing the data which should be written to the worksheet.

input.name: Workbook Name
input.narrative: The name of the workbook within which the data should be written. The default empty value indicates the current workbook within the specified instance.

input.name: Worksheet Name
input.narrative: The name of the worksheet on which the given data should be written. The default empty value indicates the current sheet within the specified workbook.

input.name: Cell Reference
input.narrative: The reference at which the collection should be written.

input.name: Include Column Names
input.narrative: True to indicate that the column names from the collection should be written out as the first row; False to ignore the column names and just write out the data.

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The integer handle identifying the instance on which the workbook which should be closed resides. The default of zero indicates the currently active instance.

input.name: Workbook Name
input.narrative: The name of the workbook which should be closed.

input.name: Save Data
input.narrative: True to save the data before closing the workbook; The default of False will discard any changes before closing the workbook.

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path of the text file to append to

input.name: Text
input.narrative: The text to append to the file

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The integer handle identifying the instance on which the workbook should be created. The default of zero indicates the currently active instance.

output.name: Workbook Name
output.narrative: The name of the workbook that Excel has created - this can be changed using the "Save Workbook As" action

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The integer handle identifying the instance on which the workbook which should be saved resides. The default of zero indicates the currently active instance.

input.name: Workbook Name
input.narrative: The name of the workbook which should be saved

input.name: Filename
input.narrative: The full path and filename to which the workbook should be saved.

output.name: New Workbook Name
output.narrative: The new workbook name which Excel will use to identify the workbook within the instance.

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path of the text file to append to

input.name: Text
input.narrative: The text to append to the file
input.expr: Now() & ":" & " Unable to generate the summary report" & "The file name or path does not exist OR The file is being used by another program OR The workbook you are trying to save has the same name as a currently open workbook"

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.name: Collection In
input.narrative: The collection to filter.

input.name: Filter
input.narrative: The filter query.

input.name: Collection In
input.narrative: The collection to filter.

input.name: Filter
input.narrative: The filter query.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection
